CVE-2016-4676.description: Multiple memory corruption issues were addressed through improved memory handling. CVE-2016-4666: Apple WebKit Available for: OS X Yosemite v10.10.5, OS X El Capitan v10.11.6, and macOS Sierra 10.12
CVE-2016-4676.impact: Processing maliciously crafted web content may lead to arbitrary code execution

CVE-2016-7626.description: This issue was addressed through improved sanitization. CVE-2016-7651: Ju Zhu and Lilang Wu of Trend Micro Profiles Available for: All Apple Watch models
CVE-2016-7626.impact: An issue existed which did not reset the authorization settings on app uninstall
